Entry.Name: cool-is-a-stupid-metric-for-tech
Entry.Description: Choosing technology by it's cool factor is a stupid thing to do. Whether it's choosing what technologies to build your business on or scale it out. Whether you're looking to score your first job or switch to new technologies.

Entry.Name: be-the-dumbest-person-in-the-room
Entry.Description: There is a saying that goes, "If you're the smartest person in the room, you're in the wrong room".
